entities.name: longbottom
entities.description: Longbottom is described as a boy who had been brought up by his grandmother.

entities.name: seamus
entities.description: Seamus is mentioned as still wearing his Ireland rosette.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as growing tired of the Quidditch talk and trying to learn a Summoning Charm.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as listening jealously to the others' conversation.

entities.name: gran
entities.description: Gran is mentioned as not wanting to go to the Cup match.

relationships.description: Neville's grandmother did not want to go to the Cup match.
There is no mention of a relationship between Hermione and Longbottom.
Seamus is still wearing his Ireland rosette.
Neville listened miserably to the others' conversation about the Cup match.
